divs: sighting detailshi, i regularly visit detroit michigan on business. this week i stayed at the westin ,1114 washington blvd. i got a room that overlooked the canada border and on wednesday night(04\29\09) , i was working at 10:30 in the night and i happened to look into the sky from my windows. i observed this strange triangular lights first i thought some helicopters might be flying.. but then i observed that the light on the top was stable and the lights other two lights were moving very quickly .. i observed them for more than 20 minutes.. and then it suddenly struck me that they can take me away... so i closed the blinds.. and called by husband.. then he asked me to check if they were still there.. i found them there again and i closed the windows...
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
